title: cf.tls\_client\_auth.cert\_serial
content:
`cf.tls_client_auth.cert_serial` String

Serial number of the certificate in the request.

This field is only filled in if the request includes a client certificate for [mTLS authentication](https://developers.cloudflare.com/ssl/client-certificates/enable-mtls/).

<page>

  certificate included in the request.
